name: Rules of The Mafia: Trade & Blood
description: Criminal gangs and their conflicts are waiting for you in our game Rules of The Mafia: Trade & Blood! Control a mafia clan and keep the whole city under control.
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 7 İşlemci: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Bellek: 4 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Sürüm 9.0 Depolama: 180 MB kullanılabilir alan
